## Why

## Checklist

- [ ] No business logic in resolvers
- [ ] No unnecessary nullable fields in GraphQL interface or DB
- [ ] All resolvers use generated interfaces (eg. `ProductResolvers.Resolvers<Container>`)

## What is affected

- [ ] Store API
- [ ] Payment API
- [ ] Mobile BFF
- [ ] Mobile UI
- [ ] Profile API
- [ ] VMS BFF
- [ ] VMS UI
